remarks: Elementhood in the set of subcategories.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Jan-2017.)
statement:
issubc.h $e |- H = ( Homf ` C ) $.
issubc.i $e |- .1. = ( Id ` C ) $.
issubc.o $e |- .x. = ( comp ` C ) $.
issubc.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) $.
issubc.s $e |- ( ph -> S = dom dom J ) $.
issubc $p |- ( ph -> ( J e. ( Subcat ` C ) <-> ( J C_cat H /\ A. x e. S ( ( .1. ` x ) e. ( x J x ) /\ A. y e. S A. z e. S A. f e. ( x J y ) A. g e. ( y J z ) ( g ( <. x , y >. .x. z ) f ) e. ( x J z ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d C f g x y z $.

$d S f g x y z $.
